alert.note: Alert for Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 6:53AM EDT until July 29 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Powell. In southeast Kentucky, Lee, Magoffin, Morgan and Wolfe. * WHEN...Until noon EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 650 AM EDT, Flooding persists due to heavy rain that fell during the late night and early morning hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Campton, Lewis, Fincastle, Lexie, Landsaw, Trent, Malaga, Hazel Green, Lower Gilmore, Gilmore, Baptist, Stillwater, Daysboro, Upper Gilmore, Toliver, Murphyfork, Gosneyville, Helechawa, Rexville and Lee City.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
